bioghist.head: Historical Information
bioghist.p: Montgomery County, named for Richard Montgomery, was formed from Fincastle County in 1776. Part of Botetourt County was added in 1790 and part of Pulaski County was added in 1842.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Claims, 1803-1806, of individuals and county officials owed money by the county and the Commonwealth.
